CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper August 27, 1955, pg. 17, reads: "Homestead Integrals - Many residents today, like the men in the photo to the right, known as the 'Brothers of the Brush,' because of their participation in the beard-growing contest in Homestead's Diamond Jubilee, remember Homestead's former 'Big Three"... The ''Brothers of the Brush,' who were photographed outside the Skyrocket, which since the 'Sonnyman's' death has been operated by his wife, Helen are, left to right, Charles Venable, David Gilmen, Ted Brown, James Brown, Leslie Fergusson, Junius Brown, Alexander Hughes and Otis Wilbon. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: "Brothers of the Brush" Charles Venable, David Gilmen, Ted Brown, James Brown, Leslie Fergusson, Junius Brown, Alexander Hughes and Otis Wilbon in front of Sky Rocket Grill with bunting inscribed "Homestead 1955," and US Steel Works in background, Amity Street, Homestead
